text: Floe Lake is a lake in Kootenay National Park, British Columbia, Canada. The lake is only accessible by a 10.7 km http://www.pc.gc.ca/pn- np/bc/kootenay/activ/activ17_E.asp#9 Parks Canada - Multi Day Hiking hiking trail that leaves from a marked trailhead on highway 93. There is a backcountry campground at the lake as well as a Warden's cabin staffed by Parks Canada. An image of Floe Lake appears on the wall of the International Arrivals at Customs Canada in the Calgary International Airport. ==References== Category:Lakes of British Columbia Category:Kootenay National Park
title: Floe Lake
